SEARCH
Package org.spongepowered.api.advancement.criteria.trigger

Interface Trigger<C extends FilteredTriggerConfiguration>

Type Parameters:
C - The configuration type
All Superinterfaces:
DefaultedRegistryValue
@CatalogedBy(Triggers.class) public interface Trigger<C extends FilteredTriggerConfiguration> extends DefaultedRegistryValue
Represents a source that can trigger a AdvancementCriterion.
